usage.adminAccess: Only users with admin privileges can access the Import Playlist feature
steps: 1. Click the 'Import Playlist' button in the Course Content section
2. Enter a YouTube playlist URL in the dialog
3. Click 'Preview' to fetch and preview the playlist content
4. Review the playlist title and video list
5. Click 'Import X Videos' to create a new module with all videos
limitations: Limited to 50 videos per playlist to prevent performance issues
Playlist must contain at least one video
Video duration extraction requires additional API calls (currently set to 'N/A')

errorHandling.invalidUrl: Shows error message for malformed URLs
errorHandling.privatePlaylist: Shows error if playlist is private or inaccessible
errorHandling.emptyPlaylist: Shows error if no videos are found in the playlist
errorHandling.networkError: Shows error for network connectivity issues
errorHandling.loadingState: Shows loading spinner during playlist fetch
